column2: barplot(mesescomparacion2021$newKgTon,names = c("En.","Feb.","Mar.","Abr.","May.","Jun.","Jul.","Ag.","Sep.","Oct","Nov.","Dic."),col = colorRampPalette(c("blue", "green", "yellow", "red"))(12),ylim = c(0,max(mesescomparacion2021$newKgTon)+100),ylab = "Cobre(kTM) ",xlab = "Meses", main = "GR 8: DEMANDA DEL COBRE DEL 2021")
